What is the purpose of the JavaScript `Array.prototype.map()` function?
options: It loops through each item in an array.
It tests whether at least one element in the array passes the test implemented by the provided function.
It creates a new array with the results of calling a function for every array element.
It merges two or more arrays.
correct_answer: It creates a new array with the results of calling a function for every array element.
